title: Can I do Tayammum for tahajjud if the water is very cold? #assim assim al hakeem
transcript: uh sir I have a question that uh as for my studies I'm living in a hostel and at night when I about to pray tahajud there's no availability of warm water and I'm afraid that I'll catch cold if I use cold water can I use tum as I brought it from my house can you use what tum okay tum is only permissible when a person can not use water either because it's unavailable or because of his inability to use it for your case if you're in a hostel and it's too cold those living in New Deli for example and you don't have access to warm water you don't have any ability to heat the water so that you can perform W with it and you fear for your safety if you use the cold water and this is between you and Allah in this case yes this is a legitimate reason to use tum and Allah Knows Best
